code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Button}from'./loginButton';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./Navbar.css';function Navbar(){const[click,setClick]=useState(false);const[button,setButton]=useState(true);const handleClick=()=>setClick(!click);const closeMobileMenu=()=>setClick(false);const showButton=()=>{if(window.innerWidth<=960){setButton(false);}else{setButton(true);}};useEffect(()=>{showButton();},[]);window.addEventListener('resize',showButton);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(React.Fragment,null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("nav",{className:"navbar"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"navbar-container"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:"/",className:"navbar-logo",onClick:closeMobileMenu},"LABRATS"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"menu-icon",onClick:handleClick},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("i",{className:click?'fas fa-times':'fas fa-bars'})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("ul",{className:click?'nav-menu active':'nav-menu'},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("li",{className:"nav-item"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:"/",className:"nav-links",onClick:closeMobileMenu},"Home")),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("li",{className:"nav-item"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:"/about",className:"nav-links",onClick:closeMobileMenu},"About Us"))),button&&/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Button,{buttonStyle:"btn--outline"},"Login"))));}export default Navbar;
